mapper.select: /* Sta_Push.xml - callPushTotal */ call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_push_total(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
/* Sta_Push.xml - callNotice */ call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_push_setting(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
